thread.title: An Oasis in Midtown
thread.title_full: An Oasis in Midtown - Review of Roger Smith Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: cbtraveller2017
title: An Oasis in Midtown
text: A well cared for older hotel in a great mid-town location. The bathrooms are small per their period but the beds and furnishings are lovely and feel like a nicer version of home. It is a nice touch to have yogurt, granola and apples available in the lobby. Service here is among the best I have experienced.
